what: Estimate SNP heritability using LDscore regression — ldsc_h2
title: Estimate SNP heritability using LDscore regression — ldsc_h2
text: R implementation LD score regression method estimate SNP heritability, mimicking ldsc --h2 ldsc package. LDscores European subset 1000g (2015 release) 1,290,028 HapMap3 SNPs (1,173,569 SNPs freq > 5%) bundled within ldsR package used default. corresponds eur_w_ld_chr folder previously shared LDSC github. can inspect LDscores used default: df <- arrow::read_parquet(system.file("extdata", "eur_w_ld.parquet", package = "ldsR")) ldsc_h2 perform quality control input summary statistics, except merge 1,290,028 HapMap3 SNPs reference panel.

title: Estimate SNP heritability using LDscore regression — ldsc_h2
code: ldsc_h2(sumstat, weights = NULL, M = NULL, n_blocks = 200)

title: Estimate SNP heritability using LDscore regression — ldsc_h2
text: sumstat data.frame tbl columns SNP, Z N weights Optional, data.frame tbl columns SNP, L2 M Optional, number SNPs reference panel n_blocks Number blocks use jackknife estimator
